news_header: Rachel Reeves's LinkedIn profile inaccurately claimed she worked at the Bank of England for a decade, while she actually spent five and a half years there, leaving in March 2006.
news_original_title: Reeves's CV exaggerated time at Bank of England
news_text: An administrative error was cited for the discrepancy. The Chancellor's profile was updated after BBC News reported the inaccuracies. Reeves's time at the Bank has been a point of contention, especially regarding her integrity and past expenses investigations during her tenure at Halifax Bank of Scotland. Despite the controversy, Downing Street expressed confidence in her conduct.
